description:
When running nova-manage with a logfile, if one of the commands hits an exception, no error is displayed to the user.  This makes easy to miss misconfigurations.

Nova-manage should display some sort of error message if it hits an exception, instead of just sending it to the logger.
title: nova-manage fails silently if --logfile is set.

comments.content:
When running nova-manage with a logfile, if one of the commands hits an exception, no error is displayed to the user.  This makes easy to miss misconfigurations.

Nova-manage should display some sort of error message if it hits an exception, instead of just sending it to the logger.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
